foreignData.name: Geschütztes Tal
foreignData.text:
Wenn das Geschützte Tal ins Spiel kommt, begrabe jedes andere Geschützte Tal, das Du kontrollierst.
Du erhältst 1 Lebenspunkt dazu, wenn Du während Deiner Versorgungsphase drei oder weniger Länder kontrollierst.
{T}: Erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um ein farbloses Mana.

name: Sheltered Valley
originalText:
When Sheltered Valley comes into play, bury any other Sheltered Valley you control.
During your upkeep, if you control three or fewer lands, gain 1 life.
oc
T: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool.
text:
If Sheltered Valley would enter the battlefield, instead sacrifice each other permanent named Sheltered Valley you control, then put Sheltered Valley onto the battlefield.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control three or fewer lands, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {C}.
